text: @GovInslee How to kill Coronavirus in 3 weeks and open entire economy: 1) Manufacture millions of fast tests; 2) Test everyone; 3) Carriers then self-isolate or seek treatment; 4) Immune systems kill virus; 5) Open economy 3 weeks later. 6) Execute strict testing at ports of entry. Simple.
